column1: Family and friends may call at Pruzin & Little Funeral Service (811 E. Franciscan Dr.
column2: Crown Point) from 9:30 A.M. to 11:30 A.M. on Friday
column4: 2015. Funeral services will immediately follow at 11:30 A.M. at Pruzin & Little Chapel with Rev. David Wood officiating. At rest Maplewood Memorial Cemetery.
